item.title: 看似装在船上的板条箱，实际上是一个船上碳捕获系统，它能从空气中吸走碳排放物，并将其变成石头。这是占全球二氧化碳排放量 3% 的航运业正在探索的减少气候足迹的一种方法
item.description:
What looks like crates on a ship is actually an onboard carbon capture system to suck carbon emissions from the air and turn them into stone. It's one way the shipping industry, responsible for 3% of the world’s CO2 emissions, is exploring to reduce its climate footprint pic.twitter.com/cAV1fEykH4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024
